description: Escuela Viva is an innovative school in Armenia focused on sustainability and holistic education. Its mission is to cultivate children's awareness of their relationships with themselves, others, and the environment. By integrating principles of alternative education, such as those from Montessori and Leonardo da Vinci, the school emphasizes experiential learning through projects and community involvement. With a commitment to environmental consciousness, Escuela Viva aims to foster a generation that values sustainability and peace.
name: Escuela Viva
